title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 202.6 - Strategic operation plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 202.6 - Strategic operation plan

State Regulations

Financial information required to be submitted by the MTA
pursuant to paragraphs (d) and (e) of subdivision (1) of section
1269-d
of the Public Authorities Law for
operating resources and costs shall be presented in a format consistent with
the budget and plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
202.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
